original: Blidberg, Per Gustaf, major, vattenverkschef, Göteborg, f. 11/7/89 i Gbg av byggn:chef Figge B. o. Brita Leffler. G. 36 m. Margareta Gröri-kvist. Barn (t. hustr. i tid. äkt.) : Ann-Margret f. 22, Britta 23, g. m. hovrättsnotarie OLle Rishoilm, UMa 24, g. m. civileko^nom Åke Kjerrman, Ove 25. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs reallärov. 07, avg:ex. fr. KTH (V) 11, res:off:ex. 13. Föret, ett flert. res. i Europa. Und:löjtn. i fortif. res. 13, löjtn. VVK 17, kapten i fortif. res. 25, kapten VVK s. å,., miajor VVK 41. Kontrolk v. vatten- o. avloppsanläggn. i Ulricehamn 13-14, und:ing. v. Örebro stads byggn:-kont. 14-16, arb:chef v. gatu- o. väg-förvaltn. i Gbg 16-29, arb :chef v. Gbgs vattenledn :verk 30-35, vattenv:chef sed. 35, dito i Kungsbacka sed. 32. Ordf. i Sv. eldbegäng :fören. Gbgs-avd. sed. 36 o. insp. f. Gbgs kremato-rium sed. 20, led. av Sv. eldbegäng:-fören. centr:styr. sed. 41 o. av re-daktionskomm. f. tidskr. Ignis sed. 29, ordf. i Tekn. samf. i Gbg avd. V 31-33 o. i Sv. komm:tekn. fören. valnd sed. 45 samt led. av fören. prövn:nd sed. 31, komm :ie f. Int. stadsbyggn:-utställn. i Gbg 23, kassaförvalt. i styr. f. Int. eldbegäng :utställn. i Gbg 23, deput. i Ränte- o. kapitalförsäkr :anst. i Gbg sed. 35, led. av styr. f. Pens :-inrättn. i Gbg sed. 32 o. av Allm. Pens:- o. Änkekassan i Gbg sed. 44. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 09. Skr.: ett 30-tal art. i väg-, trafik-, vatten-o. eldbegäng :fràgor i sv. o. uti. tidskr. m. m. Hobby: släktforskning. RVO, Sv. eldbegäng :fören. förtj :GM.
translated: Blidberg, Per Gustaf, Major, Waterworks Manager, Gothenburg, b. 11/7/89 in Gothenburg to construction manager Figge B. and Brita Leffler. Married in 1936 to Margareta Grörikvist. Children (from previous marriage): Ann-Margret b. 1922, Britta b. 1923, married to Court Notary Olle Rishoil in 1924, married to Civil Economist Åke Kjerrman in 1925. Passed the Studentexamen from Gothenburg Realgymnasium in 1907, graduated from KTH (V) in 1911, Reserve Officer Exam in 1913. Undertook several trips in Europe. Second Lieutenant in the Fortress in 1913, Lieutenant in the Water Corps in 1917, Captain in the Fortress in 1925, Captain in the Water Corps the same year, Major in the Water Corps in 1941. Control officer of the water and sewage plants in Ulricehamn from 1913-14, assistant engineer at the Örebro city building office from 1914-16, works manager of the street and road administration in Gothenburg from 1916-29, works manager of the water pipeline plant in Gothenburg from 1930-35, Waterworks Manager since 1935, also in Kungsbacka since 1932. Chairman of the Swedish Cremation Society, Gothenburg Department since 1936 and Inspector for the Gothenburg Crematorium since 1920, member of the Central Committee of the Swedish Cremation Society since 1941 and of the editorial committee for the journal Ignis since 1929, Chairman of the Technical Society in Gothenburg, Division V from 1931-33 and of the Swedish Municipal Technology Association Election Committee since 1945, and member of the Association's Examination Committee since 1931, Commissioner for the International City Planning Exhibition in Gothenburg in 1923, treasurer of the Board of Directors for the International Cremation Exhibition in Gothenburg in 1923, deputy for the Interest and Capital Insurance Institution in Gothenburg since 1935, member of the Board of Directors for the Pension Institution in Gothenburg since 1932 and of the General Pension and Widow's Pension Fund in Gothenburg since 1944. Member of the Swedish Technical Association since 1909. Wrote about 30 articles on road, traffic, water and cremation issues in Swedish and foreign journals, among others. Hobby: Genealogy. Awarded with the Order of Vasa and the Royal Patriotic Society's Gold Medal of Merit for the Swedish Cremation Society.
